items.title: Ukraine 'ready for elections' if partners guarantee security, Zelensky says
items.description: He was speaking after US President Donald Trump repeated claims Kyiv was "using war" to avoid elections.

items.title: Judge rules Epstein grand jury records from 2019 case can be released
items.description: A federal judge says materials from the investigation can be unsealed because of a new law passed by Congress last month.

items.title: US judge blocks Trump's National Guard deployment in Los Angeles
items.description: The judge has ordered control of the the troops, which were deployed in June, to be returned to California's governor.

items.title: US sanctions network it says recruits Colombian fighters for Sudan civil war
items.description: The US Treasury said the network of four entities and four individuals is primarily Colombian.

items.title: Rebels reportedly enter key DR Congo city despite Trump peace deal
items.description: Terrified residents say heavy artillery and gunfire has hit Uvira, the gateway to Burundi.
